---
id: Cancell_order
title: Cancell order
sidebar_label: Cancell order
description: /spot/v4/order/{orderId}
---

## 接口

**DELETE** `/spot/v4/order/{orderId}`

## 请求参数

| Name      | Type   | Mandatory | Default | Description |
| --------- | ------ | --------- | ------- | ----------- |
| `orderId` | number | Yes       |         |             |

## 响应示例

```json
{
  "rc": 0,
  "mc": "string",
  "ma": [{}],
  "result": {
    "cancelId": "6216559590087220004"
  }
}
```
